metadata.name: PowerShell Credential Prompt
metadata.comment: Detects PowerShell calling a credential prompt

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('promptforcredential')))

output.summary: Detects PowerShell calling a credential prompt
